summary: IGNITION LOCK CYLINDER WILL NOT TURN.  FORD HAS REFUSED TO PAY AS MY 36,000 MILE WARRANTY HAS EXPIRED.  I AM GOING TO CONTACT EVERYONE I CAN THINK OF TO TRY TO GET THIS TAKEN CARE OF.  I WOULD APPRECIATE BEING CONTACTED IF ANY CLASS ACTION LAW SUITS ARE FILED AGAINST FORD FOR VIOLATION OF LEMON LAWS.
